solution_line_template: If Ollie caught {angus_more_than_ollie} less than Angus, then Angus caught {ollie_caught}+{angus_more_than_ollie}={angus_caught} fish.
And since Angus caught four more than Patrick, then Patrick caught {angus_caught}-{angus_more_than_patrick}=<<{angus_caught}-{angus_more_than_patrick}={patrick_caught}>>{patrick_caught} fish.
